deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: YAML import failed with unknown error
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error while importing your existing configuration.
Setup will not proceed.

Verify that your {integration_title} is operating correctly and restart Home Assistant to attempt the import again.

Alternatively, you may remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml entirely, restart Home Assistant, and add the {integration_title} integration manually.
